Token.Abstract: The MBBatteryMonitor is a service that fires event notifications when there are changes to device's battery state, battery level, and plugged-in status.
Determines the current battery state when the MBBatteryMonitor service is running.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An MBBatteryState instance whose properties reflect the current state of the device's battery. Will be nil if the MBBatteryMonitor service is not running.
